Package it.davidecremonesi.googlerecaptcha

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GoogleRecaptchaResponse
    The response is a JSON object: { "success": true|false, "challenge_ts": timestamp, // timestamp of the challenge load (ISO format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZZ) "hostname": string, // the hostname of the site where the reCAPTCHA was solved "error-codes": [...] // optional "missing-input-response", "missing-input-secret" }
    GoogleRecaptchaResponseParser  
    GoogleRecaptchaResponseParserTest  
    GoogleRecaptchaService
    Wrapper per verificare la correttezza di una response captcha https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/verify
